EmailTemplate.name: GDC Countersigned Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: GDC countersigned notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear,
Thank you for signing and returning your Global Data Center (GDC) service agreement.
Attached please find the Honeywell countersigned copy for your records. We look forward to working with you and providing continuing service.
If you have any questions or concerns, please let us know. We appreciate your continued business.
Regards,
Account Management Representative
email: gfo@mygdc.com
